item.title: Threat Hunting Standard Dll-Injected C2 Implants (Practical Course)
item.description: Hello friend, so glad you could make it. This is the first in an ongoing + always-evolving series on threat hunting. NOTE: FOR THE VIDEO VERSION OF THIS COURSE CLICK HERE The main thing I want you to know about this course is that we will learn by doing. (1) We’ll start off by creating + configuring our own virtual network, including systems for both the victim and attacker. (2) Then, instead of using prepackaged data, we’ll perform the attack ourselves.
